stats.def.connectionsByUniqueVisitor: This indicator measures the frequency of use of the platform per single user over a given period.
stats.def.uniqueVisitor: This is a user identified as unique regardless of the number of connections to the platform in a given period.
stats.firstDayOfMonth: from the beginning of the month
stats.labels.activatedAccounts: Progression of the number of activated accounts
stats.labels.connections: Progression of the number of connections
stats.labels.connectionsByUniqueVisitors: Progression of the number of connections per unique visitor
stats.labels.dailyPeak: Number of visits per time slot since September 1
stats.labels.uniqueVisitors: Progression of the number of unique visitors
stats.labels.weeklyPeak: Number of visits per day since September 1
stats.title: Stats
